FROM mes_production_feeding_detail detail LEFT JOIN mes_production_feeding feeding ON feeding.id= detail.`head_id` LEFT JOIN cus_supplier supplier ON supplier.id= feeding.supplier_id LEFT JOIN cus_materiel headmaterial ON headmaterial.`id` = feeding.`materiel_id` LEFT JOIN cus_materiel material ON material.`id` = detail.`materiel_id` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary unituom ON unituom.id = material.unit_uom LEFT JOIN cus_facility facility ON facility.id = detail.facility_id LEFT JOIN cus_facility_location location ON location.id = detail.location_id LEFT JOIN mes_process pro ON pro.id = detail.process_id LEFT JOIN mes_station station ON station.id = detail.station_id
and detail.head_id = #{headId} and supplier.name LIKE #{supplierName} and feeding.supplier_id = #{supplierId} and feeding.`feeding_no` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{planNo},'%' ) and feeding.`status` = #{auditSign} and material.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{materialsName},'%' ) and DATE_FORMAT(feeding.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(feeding.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND feeding.`production_plan_id` IS NOT NULL AND feeding.`outsource_contract_item_id` IS NOT NULL

FROM mes_production_feeding_detail detail LEFT JOIN mes_production_feeding feeding ON feeding.id= detail.`head_id` LEFT JOIN mes_production_plan plan ON feeding.production_plan_id= plan.`id` LEFT JOIN scm_outsourcing_contract_item oci ON oci.id= feeding.`outsource_contract_item_id` LEFT JOIN scm_outsourcing_contract oc ON oc.id= oci.`contract_id` LEFT JOIN cus_supplier supplier ON supplier.id= oc.`supplier_id` LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON feeding.pro_dept= dept.`dept_id` LEFT JOIN cus_materiel material ON material.`id` = detail.`materiel_id` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary unituom ON unituom.id = material.unit_uom
and detail.head_id = #{headId} and feeding.`feeding_no` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{planNo},'%' ) and feeding.`status` = #{auditSign} and material.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{materialsName},'%' ) and (detail.`plan_feeding` > detail.`out_count` OR feeding.is_quota = 0) and DATE_FORMAT(feeding.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(feeding.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND feeding.`production_plan_id` IS NOT NULL AND feeding.`outsource_contract_item_id` IS NOT NULL
